title: G4 Support, was G1. Looking for adc that's on the climb.
body: Was g2 last season, got to g1 40 lp this season. then randomly started losing games. I usually do well in lane. Have discord, looking for adc thats in the same boat to bounce back with. Prefer to play Sona and Brand. HMU: Loony Russian

replies.body: Let Try  {{sticker:sg-jinx}}  Im a main {{champion:498}}  destroying them is the only thing I like {{sticker:sg-syndra}}
